proyecto_educativo.title: Educational Project
proyecto_educativo.description: Our educational project is based on the integral development of each child, respecting their times and enhancing their unique capacities through a personalized and multidisciplinary approach.
proyecto_educativo.document_content_titl: What will you find in this document?
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_subtitle: The pillars that support our educational vision
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_descriptio: At Manitos Pintadas School we firmly believe that each child is unique, with their own development rhythm and special potentialities. Our work focuses on:
proyecto_educativo.respect_development_d: Recognizing that each little one advances at their own pace without pressure or comparisons
proyecto_educativo.enhance_capabilities_: Identifying and fostering the individual strengths of each child
proyecto_educativo.integral_development_: Working cognitive, emotional, social and physical aspects harmoniously
proyecto_educativo.collaborative_work_de: Building solid bridges between home and school for the child's success
proyecto_educativo.objectives_subtitle: Clear and measurable goals for integral development
proyecto_educativo.objective_1: Development of oral language and effective communication
proyecto_educativo.objective_3: Promotion of creativity and artistic expression
proyecto_educativo.objective_4: Development of social and emotional skills
proyecto_educativo.specific_objective_1: Identify and work on specific difficulty areas
proyecto_educativo.early_stimulation_des: Activities designed to enhance cognitive, motor and linguistic development through play and exploration.
proyecto_educativo.individual_attention_: Personalized plans adapted to the specific needs of each child, with continuous monitoring.
proyecto_educativo.continuous_evaluation: Constant progress monitoring through systematic observations and appropriate evaluation tools.
proyecto_educativo.team_subtitle: Specialized professionals working together for integral development
proyecto_educativo.team_parvularia_desc: Educators with specialized training in child development and active methodologies
proyecto_educativo.team_therapist_desc: Specialist in oral language stimulation, comprehension and verbal expression
proyecto_educativo.team_psychologist_des: Professional who works on emotional development, social and school adaptation
proyecto_educativo.team_occupational_des: Specialist in fine motor development, coordination and daily living skills
proyecto_educativo.team_meetings: Our team meets weekly to review cases and adjust strategies, ensuring a comprehensive and coordinated approach for each child.
proyecto_educativo.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the video capsule?

centro_consejo.title: Parent Center and Council
centro_consejo.subtitle: Why join the Parent Center?
centro_consejo.description: Discover the benefits of being an active part of our educational community
centro_consejo.feature_community_desc: More than 80 committed families working together for our children's education
centro_consejo.feature_transparency_desc: Open management and democratic decisions with monthly accountability
centro_consejo.feature_resources_desc: Access to educational workshops, specialist talks and teaching materials
centro_consejo.feature_support_desc: Direct connection with other parents and education professionals
centro_consejo.feature_participation_des: Direct involvement in school activities and community events
centro_consejo.feature_recognition_desc: Valuation of each family's contribution to educational development

carlos_rodriguez.name: Carlos Rodr√≠guez

pedro_morales.name: Pedro Morales
pedro_morales.content: The community is incredible, there's always support and collaboration between families.

isabel_fernandez.content: Direct communication with teachers has improved a lot since I joined.

roberto_jimenez.name: Roberto Jim√©nez

carmen_vega.content: I feel more empowered as a mother participating in educational decisions.

miguel_torres.name: Miguel Torres
miguel_torres.content: The support network between parents is fundamental for our children's development.

patricia_lopez.name: Patricia L√≥pez
patricia_lopez.content: Family events have helped us create stronger bonds with the school.

francisco_herrera.name: Francisco Herrera
francisco_herrera.content: Transparency in resource use gives us great confidence.

sofia_mendoza.name: Sof√≠a Mendoza
sofia_mendoza.content: Parenting workshops have transformed my way of educating at home.

diego_castro.name: Diego Castro
diego_castro.content: Participation in school activities has strengthened my relationship with my child.

valentina_ruiz.name: Valentina Ruiz
valentina_ruiz.content: Emotional support between families is what I value most about the parent center.

andres_moreno.name: Andr√©s Moreno

daniela_paredes.name: Daniela Paredes
daniela_paredes.content: The resources we share have enriched all the children's learning.

team.description: Our team is made up of people who care deeply about the well-being and learning of each child. Here we work together to accompany, support and guide the families of our little school.

home.welcome.title: Welcome to Manitos Pintadas
home.welcome.description: We are a small school in Los Sauces that warmly welcomes children from 3 to 6 years old. Here the little ones learn, play and grow in Medio Mayor, Pre-Kinder and Kinder courses, always accompanied and respected.
home.mission.title: Our Mission
home.mission.description: We want every child to grow happy, learn and develop in an environment of respect and affection. We seek for everyone to be able to learn, live together and prepare for life, always valuing joy and simplicity.
home.vision.title: Our Vision
home.vision.description: We dream of being a school recognized for its teamwork, where each student is valued and supported. We want our students to be responsible, creative and joyful people, prepared to contribute to their community and the world.
home.features.title: Why choose Manitos Pintadas?
home.features.description: Here you will find a safe place, with people who accompany you and help you grow. We care about each student and their family, always with a smile and an open heart.
home.excellence.title: Academic Excellence
home.excellence.description: We teach with affection and dedication, using methods that help each child learn at their own pace.
home.team.title: Multidisciplinary Team
home.team.description: We have professionals in psychology, speech therapy, social work and special education. We all work together to support children and their families.
home.innovation.title: Technological Innovation
home.innovation.description: We use simple digital tools so that learning is easier and more entertaining for everyone.
home.footer.school.name: Manitos Pintadas Special Language School
home.footer.school.description: We work with dedication so that every child feels accompanied and can learn with joy.
home.explore.title: Explore Our Portal
home.explore.description: Discover more about our educational community and stay connected.
home.footer.contact.address: üìç Anibal Pinto N¬∫ 160, Los Sauces, Chile
